entries.content: Objections are information requests, not rejections.
entries.notes: Implied by handling objections as opportunities to provide more info

entries.content: Ask for a short time commitment (30 seconds) to address objections upfront.
If by the end you're not interested, you can hang up and I'll never call you again.
When prospect says no, it's often a polite way to end conversation, not a final rejection.
You can't hurt the feelings of a salesman.
Recognize when prospect has genuinely closed their mind vs. needing more information.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
